trans-unit.source: After modification, do not forget to regenerate thumbnails
trans-unit.target: 修改後，請重新產生縮圖

trans-unit.source: After moving all of your product images, set the "Use the legacy image filesystem" option above to "No" for best performance.
trans-unit.target: 在移動了所有產品圖片後，設定上面 "使用舊有圖片檔案系統" 選項為 "否" 來改善效能

trans-unit.source: Also, regenerating thumbnails for all existing images can take several minutes, please be patient.
trans-unit.target: 此外，為所有現有圖像重新生成縮略圖可能需要幾分鐘時間，請耐心等待。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while uploading the favicon: cannot copy file "%s" to folder "%s".
trans-unit.target: 上傳favicon時出錯：無法將文件“%s”複製到文件夾“%s”。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred. The information "%s" is missing.
trans-unit.target: 發生錯誤。缺少信息 "%s"。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred. The template "%s" is missing.
trans-unit.target: 出現錯誤。模板 "%s" 缺失。

trans-unit.source: Be careful! Depending on the options selected, former manually uploaded thumbnails might be erased and replaced by automatically generated thumbnails.
trans-unit.target: 小心！ 根據選擇的選項，以前手動上傳的縮略圖可能會被刪除並替換為自動生成的縮略圖。

trans-unit.source: Cannot adapt theme to RTL languages.
trans-unit.target: 無法使主題適應RTL語言。

trans-unit.source: Cannot write images for this type: %1$s. Please check the %2$s folder's writing permissions.
trans-unit.target: 不可改寫圖像種類：%1$s。請檢查 %2$s 文件夾的改寫權利

trans-unit.source: Current theme is unavailable. Please check your theme's directory name ("%s") and permissions.
trans-unit.target: 現在的主題不存在。請核對你的主題目錄名稱 ("%s") 和權限

trans-unit.source: Delete the images linked to this image setting
trans-unit.target: 刪除連結到此圖像設定的圖像

trans-unit.source: Failed to delete theme. Make sure you have permissions and theme is not used.
trans-unit.target: 刪除主題失敗。 確保您具有權限並且未使用主題。

trans-unit.source: Failed to resize image file (%filepath%)
trans-unit.target: 未能調整圖像文件大小（%filepath%）

trans-unit.source: If you delete this image format, the theme won't be able to use it anymore. This will result in a degraded experience on your front office.
trans-unit.target: 如果刪除此圖像格式，則主題將無法再使用它。這將導致您的前台體驗下降。

trans-unit.source: Invalid file format.
trans-unit.target: 文件格式無效。

trans-unit.source: Make sure the theme you use doesn't rely on this image format before deleting it.
trans-unit.target: 在刪除之前，請確保您使用的主題不依賴此圖像格式。

trans-unit.source: Only part of the images have been regenerated. The server timed out before finishing.
trans-unit.target: 只有部分圖片重新產生，伺服器在完成前逾時

trans-unit.source: Original image is corrupt (%filename%) for product ID %id% or bad permission on folder.
trans-unit.target: 商品 ID %id% 的原始圖片 (%filename%) 已毀損, 或是圖片所在資料夾存取權限有誤.

trans-unit.source: Original image is missing or empty (%filename%) for product ID %id%
trans-unit.target: 商品 ID %id% 的原始圖片 (%filename%) 不存在或是已遺失.

trans-unit.source: Regenerate thumbnails for the selected images? With the "erase" option enabled, the previously selected thumbnails will be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 重新生成所選圖像的縮略圖嗎？啟用「刪除」選項將刪除先前選擇的縮略圖

trans-unit.source: Server timed out. The watermark may not have been applied to all images.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器逾時，浮水印也許沒有套用到所有圖片

trans-unit.source: Source file does not exist or is empty (%filepath%)
trans-unit.target: 來源檔案不存在或是空的 (%filepath%)

trans-unit.source: The page Category cannot be moved here.
trans-unit.target: 類別頁面無法移動到此處。

trans-unit.source: There is already a theme %theme_name% in your themes folder. Remove it if you want to continue.
trans-unit.target: 您的主題文件夾中已存在一個主題%theme_name%，請刪除該主題以繼續。

trans-unit.source: This name already exists.
trans-unit.target: 這名已經存在。

trans-unit.source: Warning: if no email logo is available, the main logo will be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 警告：如沒有定義電郵徽標，將會改用主徽標。

trans-unit.source: You can choose to keep your images stored in the previous system. There's nothing wrong with that.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇保留儲存在舊有系統的圖片，這不會造成任何錯誤

trans-unit.source: Your RTL stylesheets has been generated successfully
trans-unit.target: 您RTL的樣式表已成功生成

trans-unit.source: Your theme has been correctly exported: %path%
trans-unit.target: 您的主題板模已經成功被導出到: %path%

trans-unit.source: Your theme has been correctly reset to its default settings. You may want to regenerate your images. See the Improve > Design > Images Settings screen for the '%regenerate_label%' button.
trans-unit.target: 你的主題已經被正確重新設置到默認模式。請可能要重新生成你的圖片。請見改善> 設計 > 圖片設定屏幕來找到 '%regenerate_label%' 的按鈕。
